title: Week In Politics: U.S.-Iran Policy, Netanyahu Speech
teaser: Robert Siegel speaks with regular political commentators EJ Dionne of the Washington Post and Brookings Institution and David Brooks of the New York Times. They discuss U.S.-Iran policy and the upcoming speech of Israel's Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
